name: Haper Lee
description: Harpers Lee is an American writer, editor, and publisher who is best known for writing the book To Kill a Mockingbird, which won the 1960 Nebula Award.

name: J.K Rowling
description: J.K Rowling is a British writer, known for the Harry Potter series.
books: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

name: George Orwell
description: George Orwell was a British author and journalist, known for his dystopian novels such as 1984 and Animal Farm.

name: Stephen King
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Stephen King is an American novelist, short story writer, and screenwriter. He is known for his horror, suspense, and supernatural fiction.

name: Agatha Christie
description: Agatha Christie was a British mystery writer, known for her detective stories, which often feature the sleuth Hercule Poirot.
